analyst_B.goal: Analyze the provided initial facts and the action schemas and produce a structured summary of objects, predicates, initial state, goal state, and identify what operators or sequences could achieve the goal and any missing assumptions or conflicts. Do not emit PDDL.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate the analysts' structured analyses and produce a complete PDDL domain and problem file encoded for the FastDownwards solver that captures predicates, objects, action schemas, initial state and goals. Keep all agent actions distinct and consistent.

public_information: Available actions: paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted
Predicates commonly used: hand, cats, texture, vase, next, sneeze, collect, spring, stupendous
Action paltry requires: hand OBJ0, cats OBJ1, texture OBJ2, vase OBJ0 OBJ1, next OBJ1 OBJ2. Effect: make next OBJ0 OBJ2 true and vase OBJ0 OBJ1 false
Action sip requires: hand OBJ0, cats OBJ1, texture OBJ2, next OBJ0 OBJ2, next OBJ1 OBJ2. Effect: make vase OBJ0 OBJ1 true and make next OBJ0 OBJ2 false
Action clip requires: hand OBJ0, sneeze OBJ1, texture OBJ2, next OBJ1 OBJ2, next OBJ0 OBJ2. Effect: make vase OBJ0 OBJ1 true and make next OBJ0 OBJ2 false

Action wretched requires: sneeze OBJ0, texture OBJ1, texture OBJ2, stupendous OBJ3, next OBJ0 OBJ1, collect OBJ1 OBJ3, collect OBJ2 OBJ3. Effect: make next OBJ0 OBJ2 true and make next OBJ0 OBJ1 false
Action memory requires: cats OBJ0, spring OBJ1, spring OBJ2, next OBJ0 OBJ1. Effect: make next OBJ0 OBJ2 true and make next OBJ0 OBJ1 false
Action tightfisted requires: hand OBJ0, sneeze OBJ1, texture OBJ2, next OBJ1 OBJ2, vase OBJ0 OBJ1. Effect: make next OBJ0 OBJ2 true and make vase OBJ0 OBJ1 false
Notes: Objects are named object_0 ... object_13 in the scenarios provided. The workflow will require integrating multiple initial statements and plans.

analyze.system_prompt: You are an analyst agent. Your task is to examine action schemas, the given initial facts and the proposed plan, and produce a clear structured analysis listing objects, predicates, initial facts, goal facts, a stepwise mapping from each plan step to the applicable action schema and its preconditions and effects, and any missing assumptions or conflicts. Do not produce PDDL. Focus on clarity and consistency.
analyze.prompt: Your name is analyst_A. Public information: {environment->public_information} Your private knowledge: {agents->analyst_A->private_information} Your analysis objective: {agents->analyst_A->goal} Provide a structured analysis as requested in the system prompt.

analyze.system_prompt: You are an analyst agent. Your task is to examine action schemas and the provided initial facts and produce a clear structured analysis listing objects, predicates, initial facts, goal facts, candidate operator sequences to reach the goal, and any missing assumptions or conflicts. Do not produce PDDL. Focus on clarity and consistency.
analyze.prompt: Your name is analyst_B. Public information: {environment->public_information} Your private knowledge: {agents->analyst_B->private_information} Your analysis objective: {agents->analyst_B->goal} Provide a structured analysis as requested in the system prompt.

pddl.system_prompt: You are the orchestrator agent responsible for integrating multiple analysts' structured analyses and producing a final PDDL domain and problem file encoded for the FastDownwards planner. Produce a STRIPS-compatible PDDL domain and a PDDL problem. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep actions distinct and preserve the original agent-level action semantics. Do not invent unstated predicates; if information is missing, note the assumptions you made in comments in the PDDL problem section.
pddl.prompt: You are orchestrator. You will receive analyses: {analysis_A} and {analysis_B}. Your goal is: {agents->orchestrator->goal} Integrate the analyses, resolve naming or object mismatches, produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem suitable for FastDownwards, and ensure the domain encodes the described preconditions and effects for paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, and tightfisted. Enclose domain and problem as required by the system prompt.
